descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][size=2]Before we start, I would like everyone to be aware that this is my first attempt at a mod, let alone a follower mod.
I am new to this community aswell as modding, if there are any issues please tell me. Criticism is truly appreciated, but please don't be too harsh.[/size][/color]

[size=5]♥-----------------------------------------------------♥[/size]

[color=#e69138]♥ [/color][color=#b45f06]L[/color][color=#e69138]ady [/color][color=#b45f06]M[/color][color=#e69138]egara ♥[/color]


[color=#e06666][size=3][Summary][/size][/color]

[size=2][b]Megara is a standalone follower, which means no other mods will be required.[/b]
[b]You can continue use of other body mods without fear of clashing.[/b]
[b]Megara is a pyro mage, along with knowledge of summoning and healing.[/b]
[b]Megara can also summon a Flame Atronach to provide extra cover.[/b][/size]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]♥-----------------------------------------------------♥
[/size][/font]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][color=#e06666][Character Information][/color]
[/size]
[size=2]Megara uses UNP Blessed Body.
She levels up with your character.
She is a master in Destruction art.
Megara is unique and un-killable.
She can sneak with you easily.
She's friendly to NPCS and player.
She likes to hang around both
[color=#6aa84f]SLEEPING GIANT INN [/color]and[color=#6aa84f] DRAGONSREACH[/color]
[/size]Megara can wear UNPB clothing.
[/font][/b]
[b]♥-----------------------------------------------------♥[/b]
[/font][b][font=Trebuchet MS]
[color=#e06666][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][Compatibility][/size][/font][/b]
[/color][/font][/b]
So far, Megara can be used in both
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
and
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]

[b]♥-----------------------------------------------------♥[/b][/center][b][font=Trebuchet MS][center][color=#e06666][size=3][Credit][/size]
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027/?]Hvergelmer[/url]

♥ ♥ ♥ ♥

♥ ♥ ♥ ♥

by, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27578610/?]regenbot03[/url]

♥ ♥ ♥ ♥[/center][/font][/b][center]

♥ ♥ ♥ ♥[/center][center]

[b][font=Trebuchet MS]♥-----------------------------------------------------♥

[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#e06666][b][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][Bugs and Issues]
(These will be fixed in next update)

[/size][/font][/b][/color][/font][/b][/font][/b][/font][/b]Eyes - Tend to become white in certain lighting

Possible skill fix and update[/center]

[center][b][u][color=#00ff00][size=3]YOU MAY HAVE TO DOWNLOAD THE SG HAIR PACK 268 TO SEE HER HAIR CORRECTLY, UNTIL I CREATE A FULL STANDALONE![/size][/color][/u][/b][/center]
author: Erufuyu
